subject: Music
subcategory: The History of Rock and Roll
title: The Garage Rock Revival
description: Learn The Garage Rock Revival in one minute.

hook.text: In the early 2000s, bands grabbed old guitars and made rock sound raw again.

buildup.text: The Strokes, White Stripes, and Arctic Monkeys stripped rock back to basics.

discovery.text: The White Stripes used only guitar and drums â€” proving two people was enough.

twist.text: Arctic Monkeys became the first band to reach number one through internet buzz alone.

climax.text: The revival showed rock could compete with pop and hip-hop by being itself.

punchline.text: Rock's future sounded a lot like its past â€” and that was the point.

quiz.question: What was notable about the Arctic Monkeys' rise to fame?
options: They reached number one through internet buzz alone
They won a TV talent show
They were discovered by Elvis's manager
